name: Atlantis Prototype
description:
Based on Atlantis from Atari2600, this is still a prototype version. 

Please provide suggestions & feedback for improvements.

  • Story from 0 up to 10, where:
    • 0 = please remove the story
    • 10 = give it an Oscar
  • Graphics 0 - 10:
  • Gamer Experience 0 - 10:
  • other..
